Z

ZKCommonInput - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge
This interface is a marker interface for Zero Knowledge input, where there is an implementing class for each concrete Zero Knowledge protocol.

ZKPOKProver - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge
This interface is a general interface that simulates the prover side of the Zero Knowledge proof of knowledge.
ZKPOKVerifier - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge
This interface is a general interface that simulates the verifier side of the Zero Knowledge proof of knowledge.
ZKProver - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge
A zero-knowledge proof or zero-knowledge protocol is a method by which one party (the prover) can prove to another party (the verifier) that a given statement is true, without conveying any additional information apart from the fact that the statement is indeed true.
ZKProverInput - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge
Marker interface.
ZKVerifier - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.zeroKnowledge
A zero-knowledge proof or zero-knowledge protocol is a method by which one party (the prover) can prove to another party (the verifier) that a given statement is true, without conveying any additional information apart from the fact that the statement is indeed true.
ZpElement - Interface in edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog
This is a marker interface.
